sentences.sContent: The new boy had an auspicious first day in the elementary school.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new boy had an auspicious first day in the elementary school.
sentences.sCn: 这个新来的男孩在小学校里有幸运的第一天。

sentences.sContent: On the reverse the same inscription is repeated, besides a row of five Swastikas as auspicious symbols signifying security and good luck.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the reverse the same inscription is repeated, besides a row of five Swastikas as auspicious symbols signifying security and good luck.
sentences.sCn: 倒转的同样碑刻是重复的，此外一排五个纳粹党所用的十字记号如幸运的符号表示安全和好运。

phrases.pCn: 好日子；吉日良辰；黄道吉日

remMethod.val: au + spic(看) + ious → 看到(好事)的 → 吉兆的

words.tran: 吉祥地；吉兆地；繁荣昌盛地

trans.tranOther: showing that something is likely to be successful
